Title: Jackie
Actors: Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard, Greta Gerwig, Billy Crudup
Plot: Following the assassination of President John F. Kennedy, First Lady Jacqueline Kennedy fights through grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define her husband's historic legacy.
Country: USA, France, Chile, China, Germany, UK
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 44 wins & 162 nominations.
Production: Protozoa Pictures, Why Not Productions, LD Entertainment
